Articles.Content:
Tried making the gekkostate ship from the anime eureka 7. I'm not that great at ksp but i think it turned out pretty well so i made a video. Was kinda tricky getting it to fly without trapar waves ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Anyway feel free to check it out, it would be greatly appreciated ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif).

[https://youtu.be/qQIeQx7cg6U](https://youtu.be/qQIeQx7cg6U)
